name: vamtiger-browser-support
description: Check and optionally add browser support for defined features

scripts.bundle: npm test && npm run build && npm run bundle-browser-test && npm run bundle-source && npm run clean-bundle
scripts.bundle-source: vamtiger-bundle-typescript --relativePath --entryFilePath source/vamtiger-aws-support.ts --bundleFilePath build/vamtiger-aws-support.js --format iife --sourcemap true --copySourceMap --minify && vamtiger-bundle-typescript --relativePath --entryFilePath source/vamtiger-browser-support.ts --bundleFilePath build/vamtiger-browser-support.js --format iife --sourcemap true --copySourceMap --minify && vamtiger-bundle-typescript --relativePath --entryFilePath source/vamtiger-contact-polyfill-support.ts --bundleFilePath build/vamtiger-contact-polyfill-support.js --format iife --sourcemap true --copySourceMap --minify && vamtiger-bundle-typescript --relativePath --entryFilePath source/vamtiger-contact-polyfill.ts --bundleFilePath build/vamtiger-contact-polyfill.js --format iife --sourcemap true --copySourceMap --minify && vamtiger-bundle-typescript --relativePath --entryFilePath source/vamtiger-contact-support.ts --bundleFilePath build/vamtiger-contact-support.js --format iife --sourcemap true --copySourceMap --minify && vamtiger-bundle-typescript --relativePath --entryFilePath source/vamtiger-element-query-support.ts --bundleFilePath build/vamtiger-element-query-support.js --format iife --sourcemap true --copySourceMap --minify && vamtiger-bundle-typescript --relativePath --entryFilePath source/vamtiger-es2015-support.ts --bundleFilePath build/vamtiger-es2015-support.js --format iife --sourcemap true --copySourceMap --minify && vamtiger-bundle-typescript --relativePath --entryFilePath source/vamtiger-fetch-support.ts --bundleFilePath build/vamtiger-fetch-support.js --format iife --sourcemap true --copySourceMap --minify && vamtiger-bundle-typescript --relativePath --entryFilePath source/vamtiger-form-support.ts --bundleFilePath build/vamtiger-form-support.js --format iife --sourcemap true --copySourceMap --minify && vamtiger-bundle-typescript --relativePath --entryFilePath source/vamtiger-web-component-polyfill.ts --bundleFilePath build/vamtiger-web-component-polyfill.js --format iife --sourcemap true --copySourceMap --minify && vamtiger-bundle-typescript --relativePath --entryFilePath source/vamtiger-web-component-support.ts --bundleFilePath build/vamtiger-web-component-support.js --format iife --sourcemap true --copySourceMap --minify
scripts.mocha: npm run bundle-node-test && npm run bundle-browser-test && mocha build/test/node --recursive
scripts.serve: npm run test && npm run bundle-source && cd build && python -m SimpleHTTPServer
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run mocha && npm run bundle-source

author: Vamtiger Immortalles
